description: Provides information about Verified Telemetry for the associated telemetry and supporting Fingerprint Information

contents.name: telemetryStatus
contents.displayName: Status of Telemetry to which this fingerprint is associated

contents.name: fingerprintTemplate
contents.displayName: Fingerprint template for the associated sensor

contents.name: resetFingerprintTemplate
contents.comment: This command will reset the fingerprint template
